title: VR fitness gets less sweaty with Meta Quest 2 Active Pack and Fitness API
description: Meta has new tools coming to help you work out. Meta announced the Meta Quest 2 Active Pack and Fitness API today during Meta Connect.

title: Legs are coming to Zuckerberg’s metaverse
description: Mark Zuckerberg announced avatars will soon include legs in Horizon Worlds, using the built-in Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest Pro tracking technology.
